feed.title: Nautical Backup Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Nautical Backup: v2.4.0
entry.content:
We are making the switch from curl requests to execute command.

The functionality is the same, but better! Now you will have access to some environment variables that you can use in your scripts.

Check out the docs for more info!

Environment Variable Changes

  • PRE_BACKUP_CURL --> PRE_BACKUP_EXEC
  • POST_BACKUP_CURL --> POST_BACKUP_EXEC

Label Changes

  • nautical-backup.curl.before --> nautical-backup.exec.before
  • nautical-backup.curl.after--> nautical-backup.exec.after
  • nautical-backup.curl.during --> nautical-backup.exec.during

Breaking change

None, any previous curl request will be automatically converted to the new exec format. However, we still recommend changing to the new format because we will eventually remove the curl labels and environment variables.

What Else Changed

  • Update minituff/nautical-backup Docker tag to v2.3.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/287
  • Change curls to execute by @Minituff in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/288

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/compare/v2.3.5...v2.4.0

entry.title: New release for Nautical Backup: v2.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Added ability to have nested source/destination folder as a new Override option.

See the docs for how to use it here

What Else Changed

  • Update docs by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/289

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/compare/v2.4.0...v2.4.1

entry.title: New release for Nautical Backup: V2.5.0
entry.content:
New Feature -> Secondary Destination Locations

Tell Nautical to backup folders to more destination locations--in addition to the normal destination folder (/app/destination).

This is a path inside the Nautical container.

Default: empty (no secondary locations)

Format: <absolute paths> (comma separated for multiple items)

properties SECONDARY_DEST_DIRS=/path/one,/path/two

What Else Changed

  • Update minituff/nautical-backup Docker tag to v2.4.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/296
  • Update docker/build-push-action action to v6.7.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/292
  • Update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.5.32 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/297
  • Update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.5.33 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/299
  • Secondary backup locations by @Minituff in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/298

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/compare/v2.4.3...V2.5.0
